des: "This is a sinfully rich, thick and creamy, and just a bit tart creme fraiche that my grandmother always made, especially in the summer to be spooned over fresh fruit. Will keep refrigerated up to a week."
ins: Mix heavy cream and sour cream together in a glass bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and let stand at room temperature until thickened, 18 to 24 hours. Refrigerate before serving, at least 15 minutes.
